parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of long values representing the swSelectType_e VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

title: ISldWorks.ISetSelectionFilters
description: Sets the status for multiple selection filters.
signature:
void ISetSelectionFilters( 
   System.Int32
Count
,
   ref System.Int32
SelType
,
   System.Boolean
State
)

parameters.name: SelType
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of long values representing the swSelectType_e VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

remarks:
The state is applied to all elements in the SelType array. To determine if the selection filter is active, use
ISldWorks::GetApplySelectionFilter
.
